meanings.definition: A type of building material made from clay or mud
meanings.sent1: The house was built with strong brik walls.
meanings.sent2: The brik was used to construct the sturdy fireplace.
meanings.sent3: The brik pieces were stacked like a puzzle to form the wall.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as solid as a brik in the face of challenges.
meanings.sent5: The sun beat down on the brik, warming it throughout the day.

meanings.definition: A type of pastry filled with meat or vegetables
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed a delicious brik filled with savory meat.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sold out of their famous vegetable brik quickly.
meanings.sent3: The brik was so tasty, it disappeared in seconds.
meanings.sent4: The warm brik melted in her mouth like a flavorful dream.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly baked brik filled the room with delight.

meanings.definition: To construct or build something using bricks
meanings.sent1: They decided to brik a new patio in the backyard.
meanings.sent2: The team worked together to brik the wall of the school.
meanings.sent3: He tried to brik a tower of cards but failed miserably.
meanings.sent4: She aimed to brik a strong foundation for her future success.
meanings.sent5: The community came together to brik a better future for all.
